metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16664 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Code injection exists in Kernel/System/Spelling.pm in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 5 before 5.0.24, 4 before 4.0.26, and 3.3 before 3.3.20. In the agent interface, an authenticated remote attacker can execute shell commands as the webserver user via URL manipulation.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.5-1').
